title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, and lastly gradually constant from 2009 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 7155.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 5082.0 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2009 to 2012.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
